mapper.delete: delete from t_metalcheck_report where ScanTime >= #{arg0} and #{arg1} >= ScanTime;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_metalcheck_report (OrderNo,SKUCode,ColorCode,Color,SizeCode,Size,PatternDimensionCode,SampleCode,ItemCode,Item, MetalcheckAddress, ScanTime,Sensitivity,ScanNum,IsDel, Creater, CreateTime, Modifyer, ModifyTime) SELECT x.OrderNo,x.SKUCode,y.ColorCode,y.Color,y.SizeCode,y.Size,y.PatternDimensionCode,y.SampleCode,y.ItemCode,y.Item, z.DicValue MetalcheckAddress,DATE_FORMAT(x.CreateTime,'%Y-%m-%d') ScanTime,x.Sensitivity ,count(x.Sensitivity) FROM t_metalcheck_detail x LEFT JOIN t_order_detail y ON x.OrderNo = y.OrderNo AND x.SKUCode = y.SKUCode INNER JOIN t_mst_dictionary z ON x.BaggingAddress = z.ID WHERE x.CreateTime>= #{arg0} AND #{arg1} >= x.CreateTime GROUP BY x.BaggingAddress,x.Sensitivity,x.OrderNo,x.SKUCode,DATE_FORMAT(x.CreateTime,'%Y-%m-%d')
